attributes.action: Mike Dean (Referee) to disclose his comments to Mauricio Pochettino at Burnley
attributes.additional_details: The usually cool headed and mild mannered Pochettino was recently issued a 2 match touchline ban and & £10,000 fine after unprofessional comments made by Mike Dean. He has refused to repeat his comments and furthermore the FA has refused to offer explanation or recordings from the referee mics to provide balance or context.
attributes.background: Mike Dean made unprofessional comments to the manager of Tottenham Hotspur after the final whistle at the end of the match against Burnley at Turf Moor this season.
